trans-unit.source: Encapsulates operating system–specific objects that wait for exclusive access to shared resources.
trans-unit.target: 封装等待对共享资源的独占访问的操作系统特定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class encapsulates Win32 synchronization handles, and is used to represent all synchronization objects in the runtime that allow multiple wait operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>类封装 Win32 同步句柄，并且用于表示在运行时允许多个等待操作的所有同步对象。

trans-unit.source: For a comparison of wait handles with other synchronization objects, see [Overview of Synchronization Primitives](~/docs/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives.md).
trans-unit.target: 与其他同步对象的等待句柄的比较，请参阅[同步基元概述](~/docs/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class itself is abstract.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>本身的类为抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Classes derived from <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> define a signaling mechanism to indicate taking or releasing access to a shared resource, but they use the inherited <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> methods to block while waiting for access to shared resources.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>定义信号机制，以指示获取或释放访问共享资源，但它们使用继承<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>方法若要在等待访问共享资源。

trans-unit.source: The classes derived from <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> include:
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>包括：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Mutex> 类。

trans-unit.source: See [Mutexes](~/docs/standard/threading/mutexes.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[互斥体](~/docs/standard/threading/mutexes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle> class and its derived classes, <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent> and <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>类和派生的类，<xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>和<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>。

trans-unit.source: See [EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, CountdownEvent, ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 [EventWaitHandle、AutoResetEvent、CountdownEvent、ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> 类。

trans-unit.source: See [Semaphore and SemaphoreSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/semaphore-and-semaphoreslim.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[Semaphore 和 SemaphoreSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/semaphore-and-semaphoreslim.md)。

trans-unit.source: Threads can block on an individual wait handle by calling the instance method <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>, which is inherited by classes derived from <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: 线程在一个单独的等待句柄可以阻止通过调用实例方法<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne%2A>，由派生自的类继承<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>。

trans-unit.source: The derived classes of <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> differ in their thread affinity.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>其线程关联的行为有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Event wait handles (<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>, <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>, and <xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>) and semaphores do not have thread affinity; any thread can signal an event wait handle or semaphore.
trans-unit.target: 事件等待句柄 (<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>， <xref:System.Threading.AutoResetEvent>，和<xref:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent>) 和信号量不具有线程关联; 任何线程都可以发送的事件等待句柄或信号量。

trans-unit.source: Mutexes, on the other hand, do have thread affinity; the thread that owns a mutex must release it, and an exception is thrown if a thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Mutex.ReleaseMutex%2A> method on a mutex that it does not own.
trans-unit.target: 互斥锁，另一方面，具有线程关联;拥有互斥体的线程必须释放它，并且会引发异常，如果一个线程调用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex.ReleaseMutex%2A>上不拥有互斥体的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class derives from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, these classes can be used to synchronize the activities of threads across application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>类派生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，这些类可以用于跨应用程序域边界同步线程活动。

trans-unit.source: In addition to its derived classes, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class has a number of static methods that block a thread until one or more synchronization objects receive a signal..
trans-unit.target: 及其派生类，除了<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>类具有多种直到一个阻塞线程的静态方法或更多的同步对象接收到信号...

trans-unit.source: These include:
trans-unit.target: 这些方法包括：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>, which allows a thread to signal one wait handle and immediately wait on another.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>它允许发出信号一个等待句柄并立即等待另一个线程。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>, which allows a thread to wait until all the wait handles in an array receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>它允许线程等待直到数组中的所有等待句柄都接收到信号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>, which allows a thread to wait until any one of a specified set of wait handles has been signaled .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>它允许线程等待，直到已终止的一组指定等待句柄的任何一个。

trans-unit.source: The overloads of these methods provide timeout intervals for abandoning the wait, and the opportunity to exit a synchronization context before entering the wait, allowing other threads to use the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的重载提供放弃等待，并有机会输入允许使用的同步上下文其他线程在等待之前退出同步上下文的超时间隔。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type or a type derived from it, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 完成后使用的类型或其派生的类型的操作后，你应释放类型直接或间接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> 实现<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>模式。

trans-unit.source: See [Dispose Pattern](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[释放模式](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A> property to store your native handle operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A>属性来存储你的本机句柄操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to override the protected <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose%2A> method unless you use additional unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 不需要重写受保护<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose%2A>方法除非使用更多的非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how two threads can do background tasks while the Main thread waits for the tasks to complete using the static <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何两个线程可以执行后台任务时主线程等待任务完成使用静态<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>类。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources held by the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由当前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 占用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is the public implementation of the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method for the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> class and its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是的公共实现<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>类和派生的类。

trans-unit.source: It provides a standard implementation that calls the `Dispose(Boolean)` overload with a `true` argument and then calls the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它提供调用的标准实现`Dispose(Boolean)`重载`true`自变量，然后调用<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to release all resources held by an instance of `WaitHandle` or a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以释放由的实例所持有的所有资源`WaitHandle`或某个派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Once this method is called, references to the current instance cause undefined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，对当前实例的引用会导致未定义的行为。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose>在发布到最后一个引用之前<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会释放它所使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: You should override the <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> method to release resources allocated in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 应重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />方法来释放资源分配中派生类。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> class
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>.
trans-unit.target: 始终调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose>在发布到最后一个引用之前<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会释放它所使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，释放 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 使用的非托管资源，并且可选择释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A> and the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose> methods with the `explicitDisposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose>方法`explicitDisposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the `explicitDisposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> object references.
trans-unit.target: 当`explicitDisposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>对象引用。

trans-unit.source: You should override the <see cref="M:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method to release resources allocated in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 应重写<see cref="M:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />方法来释放资源分配中派生类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close" /> or <see cref="M:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose" /> method can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Close" />或<see cref="M:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose" />方法可以由其他对象调用多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" /> or <see langword="Close" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写此方法，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象<see langword="Dispose" />或<see langword="Close" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the native operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本机操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="IntPtr" /> representing the native operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="IntPtr" />，它表示本机操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.InvalidHandle" /> field.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.InvalidHandle" /> 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a new value to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A> property does not close the previous handle.
trans-unit.target: 分配新值赋给<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A>属性不会关闭上一个句柄。

trans-unit.source: This can result in a leaked handle.
trans-unit.target: 这可能导致句柄泄漏。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this property in the .NET Framework version 2.0 or later; use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 或更高版本; 不使用此属性使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A>属性改为。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a valid handle also sets the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A> property, but setting it to <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.InvalidHandle> can result in a leaked handle.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为有效句柄还集<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A>属性，但将其设置为<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.InvalidHandle>可能会导致句柄泄漏。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方中，设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be set by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能通过部分受信任的或透明的代码中设置。

trans-unit.source: Derived types must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" /> to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类型都必须具有<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: Represents an invalid native operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: 表示无效的本机操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to initialize the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于初始化<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this value to determine whether the <see cref="P:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle" /> property contains a valid native operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此值以确定是否<see cref="P:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Handle" />属性包含有效的本机操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the native operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本机操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle" /> representing the native operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle" />，它表示本机操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a new value to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A> property, the previous handle will be closed when the previous <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle> object is collected.
trans-unit.target: 当你将新值赋给<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A>属性上, 一个句柄将被关闭时的上一个<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle>收集对象。

trans-unit.source: Do not manually close the handle, because this results in an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> when the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle> attempts to close the handle.
trans-unit.target: 请勿手动关闭该句柄，因为这会导致<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>时<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeWaitHandle>尝试关闭该句柄。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> pattern.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> 实现<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>模式。

trans-unit.source: See [Dispose Pattern](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[释放模式](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>, use the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A> property to store your native handle operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SafeWaitHandle%2A>属性来存储你的本机句柄操作系统句柄。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to override the protected <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose%2A> method unless you use additional unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 不需要重写受保护<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.Dispose%2A>方法除非使用更多的非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Derived types must have <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" /> to call this member.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类型都必须具有<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />若要调用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Signals one <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> and waits on another.
trans-unit.target: 向一个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 发出信号并等待另一个。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> to signal.
trans-unit.target: 要发出信号的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> to wait on.
trans-unit.target: 要等待的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: Signals one <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> and waits on another.
trans-unit.target: 向一个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 发出信号并等待另一个。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both the signal and the wait complete successfully; if the wait does not complete, the method does not return.
trans-unit.target: 如果信号和等待都成功完成，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果等待没有完成，则此方法不返回。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic.
trans-unit.target: 此操作不能保证以保证不可分割。

trans-unit.source: After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程的信号后`toSignal`，但在等待之前`toWaitOn`，在另一个处理器运行的线程可能指示`toWaitOn`或在其上等待。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%2CSystem.Threading.WaitHandle%29> method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%2CSystem.Threading.WaitHandle%29>方法重载，以允许主线程发出信号被阻塞的线程并然后等待，直到线程完成任务。

trans-unit.source: The example starts five threads, allows them to block on an <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle> created with the <xref:System.Threading.EventResetMode.AutoReset?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag, and then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 上面的示例启动五个线程，使其上阻止<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>使用创建<xref:System.Threading.EventResetMode.AutoReset?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志和用户按下 ENTER 键的然后释放一个线程时间。

trans-unit.source: The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle> created with the <xref:System.Threading.EventResetMode.ManualReset?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后另外五个线程并释放所有使用<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>使用创建<xref:System.Threading.EventResetMode.ManualReset?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toSignal" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toSignal" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toWaitOn" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toWaitOn" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The method was called on a thread that has <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 在一个具有 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 的线程上调用了该方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="toSignal" /> is a semaphore, and it already has a full count.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toSignal" /> 是信号量，已达到最大计数。

trans-unit.source: The wait completed because a thread exited without releasing a mutex.
trans-unit.target: 等待结束，因为线程在未释放互斥的情况下退出。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not thrown on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> to signal.
trans-unit.target: 要发出信号的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> to wait on.
trans-unit.target: 要等待的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the interval to wait.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示要等待的间隔。

trans-unit.source: If the value is <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />, that is, -1, the wait is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />，即 -1，则等待是无限期的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to exit the synchronization domain for the context before the wait (if in a synchronized context), and reacquire it afterward; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果等待之前先退出上下文的同步域（如果在同步上下文中），并在稍后重新获取它，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Signals one <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> and waits on another, specifying a time-out interval as a 32-bit signed integer and specifying whether to exit the synchronization domain for the context before entering the wait.
trans-unit.target: 向一个 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 发出信号并等待另一个，指定超时间隔为 32 位有符号整数，并指定在进入等待前是否退出上下文的同步域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both the signal and the wait completed successfully, or <see langword="false" /> if the signal completed but the wait timed out.
trans-unit.target: 如果信号发送和等待均成功完成，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果信号发送完成，但等待超时，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic.
trans-unit.target: 此操作不能保证以保证不可分割。

trans-unit.source: After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程的信号后`toSignal`，但在等待之前`toWaitOn`，在另一个处理器运行的线程可能指示`toWaitOn`或在其上等待。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: It tests the state of the `toWaitOn` and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 它测试的状态`toWaitOn`并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: Notes on Exiting the Context
trans-unit.target: 在退出上下文的说明

trans-unit.source: The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A> method is called from inside a nondefault managed context.
trans-unit.target: `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>从非默认托管上下文内部调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的线程位于对派生自的类的实例的调用会发生此<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>。

trans-unit.source: Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>, like <xref:System.String>, you can be in a nondefault context if a <xref:System.ContextBoundObject> is on your stack in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 即使你当前正在执行一个方法不是派生的类上<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>、 like <xref:System.String>，你可以在非默认上下文是如果<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>位于当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码执行时在非默认上下文中，指定`true`为`exitContext`导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即转换到默认上下文) 执行之前<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A> method completes.
trans-unit.target: 线程的调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>方法完成。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when the context-bound class has <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 这一点可能很有用，在此上下文绑定类具有<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，对类的成员的所有调用将自动都同步，并且同步域是类的代码的整个正文。

trans-unit.source: If code in the call stack of a member calls the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A> method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>方法并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，允许对象的任何成员的调用来继续在被阻止的线程。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A> method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait%2A>方法返回时，调用线程必须等待重新进入的同步域。

trans-unit.source: Waits for all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的所有元素都收到信号。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="WaitHandle" /> array containing the objects for which the current instance will wait.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> .NET Framework 2.0 版中新增了。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本，<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回`true`时放弃互斥体。

trans-unit.source: An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error.
trans-unit.target: 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager).
trans-unit.target: 对于整个系统互斥体，则可能指示应用程序已 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器） 突然终止。

trans-unit.source: The exception contains information useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 异常将包含信息对于调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns when all the handles are signaled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回时所有句柄都已终止。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果传递的 64 个以上的句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains duplicates, the call fails with a <xref:System.DuplicateWaitObjectException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组包含重复项，调用将失败并<xref:System.DuplicateWaitObjectException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method is not supported on threads that have <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法不支持在具有的线程上<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload and specifying -1 (or <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>) for `millisecondsTimeout` and `true` for `exitContext`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法重载是等效于调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载并指定-1 (或<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 为`millisecondsTimeout`和`true`为`exitContext`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池来以异步方式创建和写入到一组文件。

trans-unit.source: Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，每个写入操作进行排队作为工作项和信号。

trans-unit.source: The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits.
trans-unit.target: 主线程等待所有项发出信号，然后退出。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One or more of the objects in the <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组中一个或多个对象为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is an array with no elements and the .NET Framework version is 2.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 为不具有元素的数组且 .NET Framework 版本为 2.0 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />, instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array contains elements that are duplicates.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is greater than the system permits.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 中的对象数大于系统允许的数量。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> attribute is applied to the thread procedure for the current thread, and <paramref name="waitHandles" /> contains more than one element.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> .NET Framework 2.0 版中新增了。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本，<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回`true`时放弃互斥体。

trans-unit.source: An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error.
trans-unit.target: 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager).
trans-unit.target: 对于整个系统互斥体，则可能指示应用程序已 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器） 突然终止。

trans-unit.source: The exception contains information useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 异常将包含信息对于调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns when the wait terminates, which means either when all the handles are signaled or when time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回时，等待将终止，这意味着所有句柄都终止或超时发生时。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果传递的 64 个以上的句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If there are duplicates in the array, the call fails with a <xref:System.DuplicateWaitObjectException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组中存在重复项，调用将失败并<xref:System.DuplicateWaitObjectException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method is not supported on threads that have <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法不支持在具有的线程上<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Notes on Exiting the Context
trans-unit.target: 在退出上下文的说明

trans-unit.source: The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method is called from inside a nondefault managed context.
trans-unit.target: `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>从非默认托管上下文内部调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的线程位于对派生自的类的实例的调用会发生此<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>。

trans-unit.source: Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that is not derived from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>, like <xref:System.String>, you can be in a nondefault context if a <xref:System.ContextBoundObject> is on your stack in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 即使你当前正在执行一个方法不派生自的类上<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>、 like <xref:System.String>，你可以在非默认上下文是如果<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>位于当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码执行时在非默认上下文中，指定`true`为`exitContext`导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即转换到默认上下文) 执行之前<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method completes.
trans-unit.target: 线程的调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法完成。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when the context-bound class has the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这一点可能很有用，在此上下文绑定类具有<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，对类的成员的所有调用将自动都同步，并且同步域是类的代码的整个正文。

trans-unit.source: If code in the call stack of a member calls the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，允许对象的任何成员的调用来继续在被阻止的线程。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回时，调用线程必须等待重新进入的同步域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池来以异步方式创建和写入到一组文件。

trans-unit.source: Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，每个写入操作进行排队作为工作项和信号。

trans-unit.source: The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits.
trans-unit.target: 主线程等待所有项发出信号，然后退出。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not thrown on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array contains a transparent proxy for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> in another application domain.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组包含其他应用程序域中 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 的透明代理。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="WaitHandle" /> array containing the objects for which the current instance will wait.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="WaitHandle" /> 数组，包含当前实例将等待的对象。

trans-unit.source: This array cannot contain multiple references to the same object.
trans-unit.target: 此数组不能包含对同一对象的多个引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, or a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents -1 milliseconds, to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 表示等待毫秒数的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，或表示 -1 毫秒（无限期等待）的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to exit the synchronization domain for the context before the wait (if in a synchronized context), and reacquire it afterward; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果等待之前先退出上下文的同步域（如果在同步上下文中），并在稍后重新获取它，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Waits for all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal, using a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value to specify the time interval, and specifying whether to exit the synchronization domain before the wait.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的所有元素收到信号，使用 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 值指定时间间隔，并指定是否在等待之前退出同步域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when every element in <paramref name="waitHandles" /> has received a signal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 中的每个元素都收到信号，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `timeout` is zero, the method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> .NET Framework 2.0 版中新增了。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本，<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回`true`时放弃互斥体。

trans-unit.source: An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error.
trans-unit.target: 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager).
trans-unit.target: 对于整个系统互斥体，则可能指示应用程序已 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器） 突然终止。

trans-unit.source: The exception contains information useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 异常将包含信息对于调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns when the wait terminates, which means either all the handles are signaled or a time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回时等待将终止，这意味着所有句柄都已终止或发生超时。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果传递的 64 个以上的句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains duplicates, the call will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组包含重复项，则调用将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method is not supported on threads that have <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法不支持在具有的线程上<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value for `timeout` is <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 最大值`timeout`是<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Notes on Exiting the Context
trans-unit.target: 在退出上下文的说明

trans-unit.source: The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method is called from inside a nondefault managed context.
trans-unit.target: `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>从非默认托管上下文内部调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的线程位于对派生自的类的实例的调用会发生此<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>。

trans-unit.source: Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that is not derived from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>, like <xref:System.String>, you can be in a nondefault context if a <xref:System.ContextBoundObject> is on your stack in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 即使你当前正在执行一个方法不派生自的类上<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>、 like <xref:System.String>，你可以在非默认上下文是如果<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>位于当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码执行时在非默认上下文中，指定`true`为`exitContext`导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即转换到默认上下文) 执行之前<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method completes.
trans-unit.target: 它的调用后将返回到原始的非默认上下文<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法完成。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when the context-bound class has <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 这一点可能很有用，在此上下文绑定类具有<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，对类的成员的所有调用将自动都同步，并且同步域是类的代码的整个正文。

trans-unit.source: If code in the call stack of a member calls the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，允许对象的任何成员的调用来继续在被阻止的线程。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A> method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll%2A>方法返回时，调用线程必须等待重新进入的同步域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池来以异步方式创建和写入到一组文件。

trans-unit.source: Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，每个写入操作进行排队作为工作项和信号。

trans-unit.source: The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits.
trans-unit.target: 主线程等待所有项发出信号，然后退出。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组中一个或多个对象为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is an array with no elements and the .NET Framework version is 2.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 为不具有元素的数组且 .NET Framework 版本为 2.0 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array contains elements that are duplicates.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is greater than the system permits.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 中的对象数大于系统允许的数量。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> attribute is applied to the thread procedure for the current thread, and <paramref name="waitHandles" /> contains more than one element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 属性应用于当前线程的线程过程且 <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 包含多个元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is an array with no elements and the .NET Framework version is 1.0 or 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组不含任何元素，并且 .NET Framework 版本为 1.0 或 1.1。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 为 -1 毫秒以外的负数，表示无限期超时。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The wait terminated because a thread exited without releasing a mutex.
trans-unit.target: 等待终止，因为线程在未释放互斥的情况下退出。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not thrown on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array contains a transparent proxy for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> in another application domain.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组包含其他应用程序域中 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 的透明代理。

trans-unit.source: Waits for any of the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的任一元素收到信号。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="WaitHandle" /> array containing the objects for which the current instance will wait.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="WaitHandle" /> 数组，包含当前实例将等待的对象。

trans-unit.source: Waits for any of the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的任一元素收到信号。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
trans-unit.target: 满足等待的对象的数组索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> .NET Framework 2.0 版中新增了。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method returns `true` if the wait completes because a mutex is abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本，<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法返回`true`如果等待完成因为放弃互斥体。

trans-unit.source: An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error.
trans-unit.target: 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager).
trans-unit.target: 对于整个系统互斥体，则可能指示应用程序已 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器） 突然终止。

trans-unit.source: The exception contains information useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 异常将包含信息对于调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method throws an <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException>仅等待完成由于放弃的 mutex。

trans-unit.source: If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method completes normally and the exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`waitHandles`包含使用较低的索引号比放弃的 mutex，释放的互斥体<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法正常完成且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, if a thread exits or aborts without explicitly releasing a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, and that `Mutex` is at index 0 (zero) in a `WaitAny` array on another thread, the index returned by `WaitAny` is 128 instead of 0.
trans-unit.target: 在版本的.NET Framework 早于 2.0 版中，如果线程退出或中止，且不显式释放<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>，且`Mutex`中位于索引 0 （零）`WaitAny`上另一线程，返回的索引的数组`WaitAny`是而不是 0 128。

trans-unit.source: This method returns when any handle is signaled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时任何句柄处于有信号状态。

trans-unit.source: If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个对象将被发送信号呼叫期间，返回值将为所有终止的对象的最小索引值中具有终止对象的数组索引。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的 64 句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload and specifying -1 (or <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>) for `millisecondsTimeout` and `true` for `exitContext`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法重载是等效于调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载并指定-1 (或<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 为`millisecondsTimeout`和`true`为`exitContext`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One or more of the objects in the <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组中一个或多个对象为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is greater than the system permits.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 中的对象数大于系统允许的数量。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is an array with no elements, and the .NET Framework version is 1.0 or 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 是不含元素的数组，并且 .NET Framework 的版本为 1.0 或 1.1。

trans-unit.source: The wait completed because a thread exited without releasing a mutex.
trans-unit.target: 等待结束，因为线程在未释放互斥的情况下退出。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not thrown on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is an array with no elements, and the .NET Framework version is 2.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 是不含元素的数组，并且 .NET Framework 的版本为 2.0 或更高。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array contains a transparent proxy for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> in another application domain.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组包含其他应用程序域中 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 的透明代理。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="WaitHandle" /> array containing the objects for which the current instance will wait.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="WaitHandle" /> 数组，包含当前实例将等待的对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待的毫秒数，或为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1)，表示无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: Waits for any of the elements in the specified array to receive a signal, using a 32-bit signed integer to specify the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的任意元素接收信号，同时使用 32 位有符号整数指定时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitTimeout" /> if no object satisfied the wait and a time interval equivalent to <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> has passed.
trans-unit.target: 满足等待的对象的数组索引；如果没有任何对象满足等待，并且等效于 <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 的时间间隔已过，则为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method throws an <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException>仅等待完成由于放弃的 mutex。

trans-unit.source: If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method completes normally and the exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`waitHandles`包含使用较低的索引号比放弃的 mutex，释放的互斥体<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法正常完成且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a timeout occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，等待将终止，会向任何句柄发出信号或发生超时时。

trans-unit.source: If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个对象将被发送信号呼叫期间，返回值将为所有终止的对象的最小索引值中具有终止对象的数组索引。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的 64 句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Waits for any of the elements in the specified array to receive a signal, using a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> to specify the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的任意元素接收信号，同时使用 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 指定时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitTimeout" /> if no object satisfied the wait and a time interval equivalent to <paramref name="timeout" /> has passed.
trans-unit.target: 满足等待的对象的数组索引；如果没有任何对象满足等待，并且等效于 <paramref name="timeout" /> 的时间间隔已过，则为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: If `timeout` is zero, the method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`timeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method throws an <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException>仅等待完成由于放弃的 mutex。

trans-unit.source: If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method completes normally and the exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`waitHandles`包含使用较低的索引号比放弃的 mutex，释放的互斥体<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法正常完成且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，等待将终止，会向任何句柄发出信号或超时发生时。

trans-unit.source: If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个对象将被发送信号呼叫期间，返回值将为所有终止的对象的最小索引值中具有终止对象的数组索引。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的 64 句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value for `timeout` is <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 最大值`timeout`是<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is the same as calling the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%5B%5D%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Boolean%29> overload and specifying `false` for `exitContext`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法重载是调用相同<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%28System.Threading.WaitHandle%5B%5D%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Boolean%29>重载并指定`false`为`exitContext`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One or more of the objects in the <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组中一个或多个对象为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is greater than the system permits.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 中的对象数大于系统允许的数量。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is a negative number other than -1 milliseconds, which represents an infinite time-out.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 为 -1 毫秒以外的负数，表示无限期超时。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="timeout" /> is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="timeout" /> 大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The wait completed because a thread exited without releasing a mutex.
trans-unit.target: 等待结束，因为线程在未释放互斥的情况下退出。

trans-unit.source: This exception is not thrown on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> is an array with no elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 是一个不含任何元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="waitHandles" /> array contains a transparent proxy for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> in another application domain.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="waitHandles" /> 数组包含其他应用程序域中 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 的透明代理。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="WaitHandle" /> array containing the objects for which the current instance will wait.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="WaitHandle" /> 数组，包含当前实例将等待的对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 等待的毫秒数，或为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1)，表示无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to exit the synchronization domain for the context before the wait (if in a synchronized context), and reacquire it afterward; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果等待之前先退出上下文的同步域（如果在同步上下文中），并在稍后重新获取它，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Waits for any of the elements in the specified array to receive a signal, using a 32-bit signed integer to specify the time interval, and specifying whether to exit the synchronization domain before the wait.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定数组中的任一元素收到信号，使用 32 位带符号整数指定时间间隔并指定是否在等待之前退出同步域。

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitTimeout" /> if no object satisfied the wait and a time interval equivalent to <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> has passed.
trans-unit.target: 满足等待的对象的数组索引；如果没有任何对象满足等待，并且等效于 <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 的时间间隔已过，则为 <see cref="F:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block.
trans-unit.target: 如果`millisecondsTimeout`为零，该方法不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> .NET Framework 2.0 版中新增了。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method returns `true` if the wait completes because a mutex is abandoned.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本，<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法返回`true`如果等待完成因为放弃互斥体。

trans-unit.source: An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error.
trans-unit.target: 放弃的 mutex 通常表明存在严重的编码错误。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager).
trans-unit.target: 对于整个系统互斥体，则可能指示应用程序已 （例如，通过使用 Windows 任务管理器） 突然终止。

trans-unit.source: The exception contains information useful for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 异常将包含信息对于调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method throws an <xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException> only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException>仅等待完成由于放弃的 mutex。

trans-unit.source: If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method completes normally and the exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`waitHandles`包含使用较低的索引号比放弃的 mutex，释放的互斥体<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法正常完成且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, if a thread exits or aborts without explicitly releasing a <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, and that `Mutex` is at index 0 (zero) in a `WaitAny` array on another thread, the index returned by `WaitAny` is 128 instead of 0.
trans-unit.target: 在版本的.NET Framework 早于 2.0 版中，如果线程退出或中止，且不显式释放<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>，且`Mutex`中位于索引 0 （零）`WaitAny`上另一线程，返回的索引的数组`WaitAny`是而不是 0 128。

trans-unit.source: This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a timeout occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，等待将终止，会向任何句柄发出信号或发生超时时。

trans-unit.source: If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个对象将被发送信号呼叫期间，返回值将为所有终止的对象的最小索引值中具有终止对象的数组索引。

trans-unit.source: On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在某些实现中，如果多个传递的 64 句柄，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发。

trans-unit.source: Notes on Exiting the Context
trans-unit.target: 在退出上下文的说明

trans-unit.source: The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method is called from inside a nondefault managed context.
trans-unit.target: `exitContext`参数无任何效果，除非<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>从非默认托管上下文内部调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的线程位于对派生自的类的实例的调用会发生此<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>。

trans-unit.source: Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>, like <xref:System.String>, you can be in a nondefault context if a <xref:System.ContextBoundObject> is on your stack in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 即使你当前正在执行一个方法不是派生的类上<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>、 like <xref:System.String>，你可以在非默认上下文是如果<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>位于当前的应用程序域中的堆栈上。

trans-unit.source: When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码执行时在非默认上下文中，指定`true`为`exitContext`导致线程退出非默认托管的上下文 (即转换到默认上下文) 执行之前<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method completes.
trans-unit.target: 线程的调用后返回到原始的非默认上下文<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法完成。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when the context-bound class has <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 这一点可能很有用，在此上下文绑定类具有<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.SynchronizationAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，对类的成员的所有调用将自动都同步，并且同步域是类的代码的整个正文。

trans-unit.source: If code in the call stack of a member calls the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，允许对象的任何成员的调用来继续在被阻止的线程。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法返回时，调用线程必须等待重新进入的同步域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the thread pool to simultaneously search for a file on multiple disks.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用线程池可同时搜索的多个磁盘上的文件。

trans-unit.source: For space considerations, only the root directory of each disk is searched.
trans-unit.target: 对于空间注意事项，搜索每个磁盘的根目录。

trans-unit.source: If code in the call stack of a member calls the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个成员的调用堆栈中的代码将调用<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法并指定`true`为`exitContext`，在线程退出同步域，允许对象的任何成员的调用来继续在被阻止的线程。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A> method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAny%2A>方法返回时，调用线程必须等待重新进入的同步域。
